Trend Gator API

+ + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + +

+ +

Trends Endpoint

+ +

/v1/alltrends

+ + + + + + + + + + +
GET/v1/alltrends
Gets the current trends and data associated with them
+ + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + +
Response
trendsarrayArray of trends sorted most popular first
trends[i]object
trends[i].namestringName of the trend, used as a parameter in /trends/{name}
trends[i].timestampnumberUnix timestamp in seconds

GET/v1/alltrends

Parameters
pagestringPage number, starts counting from 0

news[i].titlestringArticle's headline
news[i].descriptionstringArticle excerpt or description
news[i].sourcestringArticle source, which organization it belongs to
news[i].linkstringURL link to the article
news[i].timestampstringUnix timestamp in seconds of the publishing date
news[i].mediastring|undefinedURL link to the article's featured image
tweets[i]object
